description: BVI offers an advanced synthesis of advanced technologies, functionality, and dependability in our equipment, which was designed to use innovative technologies to meet surgical needs through the evolution of hardware and software options. With unmatched precision from BVI’s Phaco Machine—a miracle of ophthalmic surgery—revolutionizes the removal of cataracts. By customizing parameters for each instance, surgeons can ensure the best possible results. The improvements made to the Phacoemulsification Machine reduce trauma, expedite recovery, and improve patient happiness. This device, with its state-of-the-art abilities and ergonomic design, is a mainstay of contemporary ophthalmology. It makes cataract surgeries safer and more effective, which in turn helps people recover their vision.
name: Phaco Machine
